channel.title: Fubo on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Fubo on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Fubo Shares Jump on Preliminary Quarterly Results Ahead of Hulu + Live TV Merger
item.description: The sports-first streamer looks set to shrink its net loss on lower overall revenues and paid subscribers when its full results are released on Aug. 8.
